page.title: 16 ABBEY SCHOOL STEEL BAND
page.content: {Faversham's Abbey School} has a {Steel Band}.Five girls and twelve boys play the instruments.The band originated in Faversham boys'Secondary School and they made their own instruments.The present band started two years ago and they have their drums professionally made.The twenty-five drums are made from oil drums.Some drums play the tune and others play the chords and lower notes.Alltogether they know twenty-five pieces of music.They practise together twice a week for forty-five minutes and in any spare time they have.They give sixty performances a year at fetes, halls,schools and carnivals .Over the last two years they have twice won the national festival of steel bands in Coventry and the Kent festival of music in Canterbury,as well as a trophy at {Faversham Carnival}.Their lively music appeals to all.
